comment: idols face some of the worst and most disgusting comments made by netizens who pick apart everything they do. we've already lost 3 idols because of this. Rest well Jonghyun, Sulli, and Hara.
진짜 루루팡님 애니메이션은 최고에요.. 아이돌의 무대 위가 아닌 무대 뒤에서의 모습을 실감나게 표현한 것도 너무 소름입니다ㅠㅠㅠㅠ

Your video and storyline is perfect. I have a great respect for all the idols. It takes courage to live your dreams. Those folks who are stalkers, overly critical, nasty or just start rumors do not have the courage to really live. It's safe for them to make critical or hateful statements. The industry and the fans need to protect and respect (idols)  them. My idols are human, not only do I remember that, it makes them more relatable to me since they give me a gift, by inspiring me. They will never know how precious that gift is. (N)

I believe that every idol in the company should have his own psychologist in case of such situations. being a media personality is very difficult, especially in k-pop, where there are a huge number of stupid standards and evil people. be kind, please. even if you hate some idol, please don't write about it where he can see it, think about idol feelings.

Depression is a very serious matter. Cyber bullying only increases, people no longer have empathy with other people who are succeeding in life. It's sad that we've already lost so many idols because of this.  

Remember if you are experiencing a difficulty, do not hesitate to seek help. 

Staying away from social media is good.

Right now, there are people all over the world who are just like you. They're either lonely, they're missing somebody, they're depressed, they're hurt, they're scarred from the past, they're having personal issues no one knows about, they have secrets you wouldn't believe. They wish, they dream and they hope. And right now, they are sitting here reading these words, and I'm writing this for you so you dont feel alone anymore. Always remember, don't be depressed about the past, don't worry about the future, and just focus on today. If today's not so great don't worry! Tomorrow's a new chance. If you are reading this, be sure to share this around to make others feel better. Have a nice day!"
